result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephen Deshawn Mitchell

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Stephen Deshawn Mitchell appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Ian F Vance-Curzan in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status of counsel in Branch PE. Status conference scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Stephen Deshawn Mitchell appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William Scott Nelson appeared by video for Stephen Deshawn Mitchell.  Prosecuting attorney Anthony J Moore appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer Branch 29.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL. Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with KMM, SLM, SDM, CSM, TTN and TMM
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
